node.title: Two boaties rescued after boat sinks in Wellington Harbour
node.description: Two people have been rescued from Wellington Harbour after their boat sunk near Somes Island.
node.content:
["Two people have been rescued from Wellington Harbour after their boat sunk near Somes Island.", "", "
Wellington Harbour Photo: 123rf
", "The pair headed out from Petone early this morning.", "Police said they radioed an emergency situation about 8am after a wave came over the stern of the boat, stalling the engine.", "While they attempted to restart the motor their vessel was swamped and filled with water, after which it sunk.", "Police coastal master Senior Constable Kyle Smith said it was fortunate both were wearing life jackets and had waterproof radio gear.", "He said it was a great example of people being prepared for the worst.", ""Everyone on the water needs a plan for how they are going to stay safe in case things go wrong," he said.", ""It's vital you prep your craft and equipment, check your gear to make sure it's safe and fit for purpose and know your responsibilities for keeping yourself and others safe.""]
